113

115

00:10:17,408 --> 00:10:19,827

completely out of control.

117
00:10:19,910 --> 00:10:22,913

118

119
00:10:25,666 --> 00:10:29,503

120

and supporting me.

happen again.

124

126

looking inward.

128

129
00:11:05,748 --> 00:11:07,917
And I'm...

131
